settings.title: Are your products all natural?
settings.answer: Yes! We are always on the hunt for the freshest ingredients to create our products. The key to all natural products is to ensure the products are potent and as fresh as possible.

settings.title: What is the shelf life of your products?
settings.answer: Our products are all 100% natural and are made with fresh ingredients. This does mean that their shelf life may be somewhat lower than traditional beauty products but that's the trade off! The shelf life of our products do range from 1 month to 5 years.

settings.title: Do you test on animals?
settings.answer: Absolutely not. We take pride in ensuring that no products are ever tested on animals. We only select ingredients from companies who do not test on animals and when we are in the process of developing new products, we only test them out with human volunteers.

settings.title: Is your packaging recyclable?
settings.answer: You bet! While we aim to eliminate packaging from all of our products, there are still some products that require some help staying put. All packaging is 100% recyclable though, and can be brought back to our physical locations for a fun treat!

settings.title: When will my order ship?
settings.answer: Because our products are handmade, we need about 3-4 days to pack and ship your full order. Orders placed after our afternoon cutoff will ship the next business day.

settings.title: How is my shipping calculated?
settings.answer: Our shipping rates are determined by location and the total weight of your order. Shipping rates will be calculated and displayed at checkout!

settings.title: I have a question about my order, what should I do?
settings.answer: Reach out! Visit our contact page for any information regarding your order! We’re happy to answer questions about Orders, Order Modifications, Shipping, Returns, & Cancellations.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.answer: If you’re not happy with a certain product, that’s okay! We just ask that returned items be 50% intact and returned with their original packaging. You can return items up to 30 days after the date it was shipped.

settings.title:
COMFORTABLE AND NATURAL ERGONOMIC DESIGN
WITH THE JOY OF LIFE IN EVERY DETAIL

settings.html_content:
Roman-column-inspired battery body, Clarinet-inspired mouthpiece,
together with an 18K gold-plated clip highlighting your unique taste and individual personality.

Roman Column

Clarinet Mouthpiece

18K Gold Plated Clip

DRAMATICALLY ENHANCED DESIGN AND HYGIENE
With 99.9% Antibacterial Rate


Incorporating the antibacterial properties of nanometric silver,
the mouthpiece effectively inhibits bacteria growth at a rate of 99.9%.
The easy-to-use cap protects your pod from dust and dirt.

ENJOY A NEXT-LEVEL MTL VAPING EXPERIENCE
WITH NEW GENERATION COIL – ETCHIP

With a fast e-liquid delivery speed and oil-locking feature, the special flax base prevents dry hits, popping, spitting and leakage.

With the enlarged heating area and improved heating efficiency, the high resistance heating mesh creates fulfilling vapor from the very first puff.

settings.title: A UNIQUE DESIGN FOR EASY CONNECTION WITH MAGNETIC AUTO-FOCUS FUNCTION
settings.text: The built-in magnets draw the pod to the right position securely, and a quick vibration click indicates that it's ready for use.

settings.title: Your Long-lasting companion
settings.text:
With a 600mAh integral battery and the 10W Etchip coil,

you can enjoy a fulfilling vapor all day long, just from one single charge

settings.title: Specifications:
settings.text:
Size: 16 * 134mm

Battery: 600mAh

Average Output: 10W

Capacity: 2.0ML

Resistance: 1.2ohm

Allowed Input: DC5V-750mA

Package Includes: 

1 * Uppen Battery,

1 * Uppen Refillable Pod,

1 * USB Cable,

1 * User Guide & Warranty Card

settings.subtitle: We love to hear from you!

settings.title: Need to get in touch?
settings.content_text: We're always happy to chat and help answer any questions you may have! Please note, we try our best to respond to all inquiries within 48 hours, Monday - Friday.

settings.title: Uppen, as pretty as it is good.
settings.text: When you’re looking for the best technology coupled with subtle and discreet design, the Uppen vape pen has it all.

settings.title: World's 1<sup style="font-size:14px;">ST</sup> Antibacterial Vape Pen
settings.text:
Dramatically Enhanced Hygiene

The innovative refined mouthpiece incorporates antibacterial technology to provide protection against common bacteria, while the quality snug-fitting cap helps keep it clean when not in use.

settings.title: World's 1<sup style="font-size:14px;">ST</sup> Vape Pen with Mesh Inside
settings.text:
Etchip Coil for Next Level MTL Experience

The bespoke 1.2 Ohm Etchip Coil has been engineered to provide an even temperature and controlled liquid delivery, for a distinctive smooth, fulfilling draw and no popping, spitting or leakage.

settings.quote:
It's just as pretty as it is good!
Most of the time, if somebody spends too much time to make their product pretty, they are trying to cover up how awful their product actually is.
However, in this case(Uppen), it's just as pretty as it is good!
It works really well.
We are big surprised, and we big recommend this.

This one for MTL is very very good, and tasty.
Even though you keep vaping non-stop for 20 times or 30 times, you won’t feel hot, and the flavor itself remain the same.

This one vapes amazingly!
When I vape this one for the first time, I couldn't believe this was a new company only judging by the way it vapes.

An excellent pod system!
The drip tip is really comfortable.
I think they’ve done a great job in this pod, and especially on the coil.

I've got to admit it's damn good pod kit. I'm very impressed with how well it works.
The battery life on it is phenomenal. And the flavor from it is absolutely super!

It’s so simple to use!
It performs just fine. The flavor is not changing. It’s not getting warm or hot.

settings.title: Rich text
settings.text:
Use this section to create some callout text on your page, or add more details about your shop, services, promotions, etc. If you have a large amount of text, you can opt to have it display in two columns instead so that it's much easier to read.

This section also includes the option to add a button in primary or secondary style, and also control the colors, including the option for a gradient background. Since this is rich text, you can also format it as you wish and include links.

settings.title: Get in touch today
settings.content_text: Customize your contact form to suit your business! Add custom fields like a dropdown menu, checkbox, text fields and more, so that you can gather pertinent info from shoppers right from the get-go, to help answer their inquiries more effectively.
